column3: Latest;Siem Reap:------ Three suspects were arrested in Siem Reap after killing their boss in Sihanoukville.------The assassination occurred at 10 pm on October 22
column8: the trio fled to their home villages in Siem Reap province
column9: where they were caught on October 23.------The men confessed to killing the man because they hadn’t received their salary. After drinking together
column10: an argument broke out and the victim was bludgeoned to death by a piece of wood.------These suspects are currently in custody awaiting court proceedings.------Source – Rasmei News
